name: Lemon's Journey
description:
Introduction

Join Mr. Lemon on an emotional journey like no other in this 2D puzzle-platformer game! In this game, you'll play as Mr. Lemon, a lemon with three different emotions (serenity, rage and fear) that you'll need to control and balance through each level to solve the puzzles.

Control

Basic controls:  A & D to move left and right. W / Space to jump.

Others: ESC - pause, I -  toggle tutorials panel, R - toggle restart/rewind panel, C - save, H - toggle hints panel.

Mouse: Click panel buttons

Features

9 levels of unique puzzle solving, including 3 challenging levels.

Utilize Mr. Lemon's different behaviours in serenity or rage emotion to help him get to the destination, but be careful - the only way to change his emotion is by interacting with other map elements. So manage your movement and route carefully!

Feel the same emotion as Mr.Lemon through gameplay.

Enjoy the peaceful game in serenity mode, but Mr.Lemon won't let you control him easily once you make him angry, as your input will be reversed! Fear will turn Mr.Lemon into a ghost and completely change the game's pace as you need to reach Lemon Angel to revive in only 10 seconds and in darkness!

Cute and funny art design.

Introduce the most hated thing for Lemons ---- lemon squeezers! Mr.Lemon will 100% be pissed if you let him touch it. And meet Lemon Master along the journey and learn important lessons for being a lemon.

Optional tools to adjust the difficulty

Save & Rewind system:  Press C to save a timepoint that saves all your progress at any moment. So you can rewind to that point instead of restarting from the beginning if you make a mistake. 

Hint system:  Press H to see hints that will guide you to the destination if needed.
